content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Ms. Rahman. I understand that you are from Saudi-Arabia and appreciate your interest in renting a place in Mannheim. Regarding the rental price, I am open to discussing a fair and mutually agreeable amount. Would you like to make an initial offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Mister Heine. I am looking for a place that is fair in price and meets my needs. Since this is a 25-square-meter apartment, I would like to propose a starting price of 650 Euro per month, including all utilities. What do you think about this offer?
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your offer, Ms. Rahman. I will consider it and get back to you with a counter-offer or acceptance shortly. Please give me a moment to review my records and the current market rates for comparable apartments in the area.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Certainly, Mister Heine. I appreciate your time and effort in finding a suitable arrangement for both parties. I am looking forward to your response.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: After reviewing the market rates and considering your initial offer, I am prepared to counter with a price of 700 Euro per month, including all utilities. This is the best I can offer at the moment. Would you be willing to accept this price?
name: Heinrich Heine
